summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 13X6 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked With Baby Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Kinky Straight Human Hair Wigs For Women Deep Part Space 13 By 6 Wigs Wet And Wavy 100% Human Hair 9A Grade 20 Inch Review Date: 2021/08/17 Store: Isufer Average Rating: 1.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Isufer', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 6.85 x 0.94 inches; 12.35 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:3de2bb88b3773ef8a1507ffa36dfd57c]] This whole wig is a scam. I’m really trying to understand where all of these great reviews came from.
This is worth Nowhere near the amount of money that I paid for this. The hairline was not pre-plucked, the knots were not bleached, and the frontal part is not the same length as the rest of the hair. I ordered a 20 inch and the frontal part is maybe 10 inches long.
I have included pictures. This will be going back today. Review Title: So disappointed Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch Review Date: 2022/03/22 Store: Persephone Product Description: ['Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Color': 'curly headband', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Persephone', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.7 x 9.1 x 1.4 inches; 6.07 Ounces'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:d0c52af0efb43e01223c088eae46c351]] This is definitely a wig that you will have to play with to get it where you want it. But no complaints for me. No weird smell and the hair curls nicely. Review Title: It’s cute but you have to play with it… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LVWIGXE Short Wigs China Virgin Hair with Baby Hair 13X4X1 T Part Hairline Silky Straight Bob Wigs for Black Women 180% Density Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 14 Inch, Orange (T Part ) Review Date: 2022/06/10 Store: Lvwigxe Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Color': 'Orange', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Lvwigxe', 'Package Dimensions': '13.35 x 8.15 x 2.2 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Lvwigxe'} Review Text: I’m pleasantly surprised with this wig. It’s soft, doesn’t shed, and is exactly as described. There are some short hairs in the way but it’s nothing major. The lace is not harsh at all. If you’re into colored hair, I would definitely recommend this. Review Title: It’s cute… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZILING Body Wave 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 150% Density Brazilian Body Wave Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 16 Inch Review Date: 2022/06/15 Store: ZILING Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 9.76 x 1.65 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Review Text: It’s a nice wig for the most part. The hair doesn’t fall the same way it does in the pictures. Also the knots are very big on this unit. They look like ants to be honest. It is not preplucked. Review Title: Basic unit…nothing that stands out Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: YILITE Blue Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 10pcs 20g Tape in Human Hair Extensions Blue Tape Hair Extensions 14 inches Review Date: 2022/06/21 Store: YILITE Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'YILITE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 2.64 x 0.59 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '737353301699'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:a60247ffbd9b2dafeea155a50c4972d7]] They pulled off the greatest heist with this one. 😂
This is not the same color that is posted. Do not waste your money.

Update: The seller updated the color. If you look at my video, the color that was posted was a dark blue. After my review, they updated the color to show light blue. Review Title: Not the same color. I wouldn’t buy it Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 13x6 Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Bleached Knots HD Transparent Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 160% Density Glueless Lace Frontal Human Hair Wigs for Women Natural Hairline (18 Inch) Review Date: 2022/07/02 Store: Gelbive Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Gelbive', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.28 x 10.91 x 3.07 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '746555819598'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:84b767f90d17c2a1b68e9f37f8dbc402]] It has potential but it depends on how you are with wigs. Straight out of the pack, it looks really nice. It had great parting space . Once I started combing through it, I realized that the hair on the lace part is shorter than the rest of the hair. Because of that, it makes the hair look very damaged. It has a ton of short hairs. You cannot straighten those to look smooth. Even with a wax stick, it didn’t help them. Review Title: Not the best Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 13x4 Body Wave HD Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 180% Density Natural Hairline Body Wave Transparent Lace Frontal Wigs Natural Color (18 Inch, natural color) Review Date: 2022/07/13 Store: GRACE PLUS Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'GRACE PLUS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.31 x 8.15 x 3.43 inches; 9.91 Ounces'} Review Text: Sheds way too much. Throwing away Review Title: Sheds terrible Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bob Wig Human Hair Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Bob Wigs for Black Women 10 Inch Bob 13X4 Lace Frontal Wigs Human Hair 150% Density Pre Plucked Natural Color Review Date: 2022/07/13 Store: Funky girl Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Funky girl', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 9.65 x 2.4 inches; 7.37 Ounces'} Review Text: Turned out better than the other ones I reviewed. Very soft and well constructed. Would recommend! Review Title: Very pretty Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs Review Date: 2022/09/02 Store: MilyBest Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: These eyelashes are everything!!! Review Title: The best! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs Review Date: 2022/10/31 Store: MilyBest Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: These are cute lashes. Great for those on a budget. Review Title: Cute Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband Review Date: 2022/11/18 Store: New Balance Product Description: ['New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is engineered with comfort and performance in mind. The unique 3D stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement while moving moisture away from the skin quickly for fast drying. These performance accessories feature our New Balance dry and New Balance fresh technology and is your new go-to accessory for any activity.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '12.01 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.04 Kilograms', 'Brand Name': 'New Balance', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Manufacturer': 'Terramar Sports', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Sport Type': 'Cycling, Skiing, Climbing, Running', 'Date First Available': 'December 18, 2019', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Fabric Type': 'polyester,polyester blend'} Review Text: Good fit. Great color. Not too warm so I would not recommend this to be worn on a winter run. Review Title: Good fit! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Vegan Mia - USDA Organic Radiance Superfruit Cleansing Oil and Make-up Remover, Oil Cleanser and Makeup Remover Oil for Dry Skin and Other Skin Types, Loaded with Moisturizer Essential Fatty Acids, Rich in Antioxidants, Truly Natural Skincare, (With No Added Fragrance) 3.4 fl oz Review Date: 2022/11/18 Store: Vegan Mia Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vegan Mia', 'Scent': 'Natural aroma of fruit oils - No fragrance added', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '6.34 x 1.77 x 1.73 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '762530483363', 'Manufacturer': 'Vegan Mia'} Review Text: I love it. It cuts through makeup easily. I do not use a lot just because it's oil. No breakouts from it either. Thumbs up! Review Title: Pretty solid! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Great color. Not too warm so I would not recommend this to be worn on a winter run. Review Title: Good fit! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with several products, particularly in terms of quality and effectiveness. Positive experiences highlight the softness and accuracy of descriptions, indicating products that meet expectations. Reviews noted the good fit and attractive appearance of wigs, as well as the pleasant interaction with false eyelashes that deliver desired effects. The cleansing oil also received praise for its ability to effectively remove makeup without causing breakouts, showcasing a trend towards appreciating well-constructed and functional beauty products.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Conversely, the user encountered significant disappointment with multiple purchases. Key issues included poor quality, such as wigs that were not as described, shedding excessively, or not pre-plucked as promised. Some products were criticized for misleading color representation, leading to dissatisfaction. Specific complaints about the construction of wigs, including uneven lengths and large knots, indicate a trend toward frustration with inadequate quality control. Overall, these experiences reflect a growing concern regarding the reliability of product claims.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience yielded a mix of satisfaction and dissatisfaction. Positive interactions centered around products that performed well and matched their descriptions, leading to repeat purchases in some categories. However, substantial negative experiences—particularly regarding wig quality and misrepresentation—highlight the need for improvements in product accuracy and quality assurance. The balance of these experiences suggests that while the user finds value in some products, inconsistent quality and fulfillment of claims remain significant concerns that could impact future purchasing decisions.
